Tetris Implementation

[Web game] Play Tetris with me on your browser and share your score.
JavaScript, HTML Canvas, CSS, Firebase Firestore

Differential Diagnosis Generator

[Tool] Generates differential diagnoses based on selected findings and symptom scoring system.
JavaScript, HTML, CSS

Binary Search Tree Visualizer

[Tool] Visualize BST operations (insert, search, traversals, etc.) without the annoying lag on other sites.
JavaScript, HTML Canvas, CSS

Imaging Vision Sandbox

[Web app] Applies augmentations and classifies images using TensorFlow (MobileNet) in-browser.
JavaScript, HTML Canvas, CSS, TensorFlow.js
